snippet.title: Hell Dive - Announcement Trailer | New Horror Game
snippet.description:
Experience the chilling depths of horror with Hell Dive! This first-person indie horror game takes you to an abandoned underwater colony where darkness hides deadly secrets. Players must retrieve black boxes, uncover a haunting mystery, and survive terrifying encounters in the abyss. If you're a fan of Amnesia, SOMA, or atmospheric survival horror games, Hell Dive is a must-watch and a must-play!

This announcement trailer offers a first glimpse into the eerie underwater world of Hell Dive, showcasing its spine-chilling visuals, immersive gameplay, and a story that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Whether you're a horror enthusiast, an indie game fan, or someone passionate about game development, this is your chance to explore the depths of a gripping horror experience.

Hell Dive is set to release on PC via Steam on December 20, 2024. 

Wishlist now to stay updated and be among the first to dive in when the game launches:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3250020/Hell_Dive/

If you’re passionate about indie horror games, game development, or simply love a good scare, subscribe to our YouTube channel to follow the development of Hell Dive. Stay updated with behind-the-scenes looks, and gameplay previews as we bring this terrifying world to life.

Don’t forget to like this video and hit the notification bell to never miss an update. Join us as we explore the dark depths of Hell Dive!

#HellDive #HorrorGame #IndieGame #FirstPersonHorror #UnderWaterHorror
